LanguageData.HiztaaXenoInvasion: The shout of a xenomorph echoes. They are charging !
LanguageData.HiztaarXenoEncirclement: Xenomorphs are surrounding the colony and launch a general assault from all directions to breach through our defenses !
LanguageData.HiztaarXenoAirdrop: Escape pods from a spaceship are landing in your base. \n\nScanners indicate xenomorph signatures inside !
